text:
Message 2281 of 4024
I’m not putting any details of what just happened into this message because that would be seen as inflammatory and counter  productive to my
sincere efforts, and outreach to try and work constructively with you. I understand the perspective and will do my best to avoid giving you the
impressions you seem to be concerned about. You will see that reflected in my heartfelt communications.
If we have to go through our capable attorneys, our kids will feel a real impact. We have three examples of serious consequences that would have
occurred with Adrian in the last ten days. So I’m asking again, please let me know how we can work together instead of against each other. Let’s find a
way to activate that superpower we shared for three decades.
This is not working and only getting worse. Let’s stop the slide.
• robert
